    <div class="field field--name-field-home-welcome-block field--type-entityreference field--label-hidden"><div class="field__items"><div class="field__item even"><a href="https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/mayor-london">
  <div class="entity entity-welcome-block welcome-block-welcome-block theme--mayoral clearfix" about="/welcome_block/welcome_block/1" typeof="" class="entity entity-welcome-block welcome-block-welcome-block theme--mayoral" data-mh="gla--homepage-welcome-block">
    <div class="content">
      <div class="field field--name-field-welcome-block-hero-image field--type-image field--label-hidden"><div class="field__items"><div class="field__item even"><img class="gla-2-1-medium" typeof="foaf:Image" alt="" src="https://www.london.gov.uk/sites/default/files/styles/gla_2_1_medium/public/website_tile-sk_mol_1309_final.jpg?itok=8mZOmmjO" width="490" height="245" /></div></div></div>      <div class="entity-welcome-block--text-container">
        <h1 class="field--name-field-welcome-block-name">Mayor of London - Sadiq Khan</h1>
        <div class="field--name-field-welcome-block-cta">
          About the Mayor        </div>
